author: mchrisman01
title: Parts of it are good.
text: The cinnamon ice cream and chocolate ice cream are great. And the cinnamon bun dough is out of this world!! But the spicy brownie in it overpowers everything. I end up picking it out of the ice cream. Honestly either the brownie needs to be taken out all together or the brownie needs to be a plain brownie instead of a spicy one. There is also so much brownie in it so it could also stand to be toned down in that regard as well
keywords_2: Cinnamon , Chocolate , Cinnamon Bun Dough , Spicy Brownie , Plain Brownie , Toned Down

author: IceCreamMan99
title: Why????
text: I got this flavor by accident. Had done curbside pickup at the grocery, but instead of Phish Food, I received this. It sat in the freezer for about a week and decided to try it. I honestly feel like my taste buds were being punished, as if i lost a bet and was forced to eat this. If fear factor created an ice cream flavor, this would be it. None of the flavors work together. The cinnamon is too strong. Would be better if it tasted more like a cinnamon roll than the cinnamon challenge from a few years back. The spicy brownie makes no sense. The flavor is so off putting, i wanted to gag. They could have easily used some sort of Mexican hot chocolate flavor and it would have been so much better. I really have no words except this is one of the most vile and disgusting flavors I have ever eaten. Save your money and make a donation to your favorite social justice charity.
keywords_2: curbside pickup, Phish Food, fear factor, cinnamon, cinnamon roll, spicy brownie, Mexican hot chocolate, vile, disgusting, social justice charity

author: lilsnackfiend
title: Singing to the Tune of Justice
text: Not only does this ice cream flavor support a I cause important to me, but it's an amazing texture and flavor combo. That spicy ribbon of fudgy brownie?! Those cinnamon roll chunks?! My tongue is dancing to this beat. How does this not have an average of 5 stars already? It's the remix I needed. Play it again! Make it a permanent member on the Ben & Jerry's Flavor Playlist.
keywords_2: Ice cream,Cause,Texture,Flavor,Fudgy brownie,Cinnamon roll chunks,Remix,Ben & Jerry's

author: lainey_moto109mx
title: DUUUUUDEEEE...
text:
I’m just gnna say. This one makes me wanna sit on the couch and just smile n dance like a chunky little kid gettin’ their ice cream shimmy on!!! The chocolate ice cream, for some reason, tastes so dang good in this batch! The toffee bits are such an awesome touch to it. The fudge cows, another awesome texture element with a hit of a nice bittersweet dark chocolate to contrast the sweet/salty toffee crunch and silky smooth milk chocolate ice cream. But the dang killer here is....... that SUGAR COOKIE CORE. WHOA B&J... ur just showing off now. That stuff.... is like.. out of this world (; U should really put a litttlleee more in the pint hehe! :D
But anywho, it’s Uber yummy!! Wouldn’t be surprised if it became a next hit and stuck around!
keywords_2: Ice cream, toffee, fudge, dark chocolate, milk chocolate, sugar cookie, hit, sweet, salty, crunch, smooth, yummy, pint, hit, stick around.

author: gotgotgone
title: New Favorite
text: This is my favorite Netflix B&J flavor and I will be purchasing again. I was worried this would be too sweet but has the perfect balance of chocolate, toffee, fudge, and sugar cookie core. The sugar cookie core is not overbearing like some other core flavors. I also love the that the texture is both smooth and crunchy. I hope this become permanent
keywords_2: Netflix, B&J, chocolate, toffee, fudge, sugar cookie, core, texture, smooth, crunchy, permanent

author: Amanda530
title: Good idea but weird
text: I was excited to try this new flavor last week. What's not to love about fudge cows, toffee, and sugar cookie. Unfortunately for me it was a major flop. The ice cream and fudge cows were enjoyable. The toffee clusters were a weird texture experience, unfortunately. I was expecting something more along the lines of the toffee in Everything But The.... which I really enjoy. The real disappointment, and reason I'm actually taking the time to review ice cream, was the sugar cookie dough core. For me, it just tasted of wet sugar. Grainy, too soft, no flavor. Ben and Jerry's has set high expectations for their products, but sadly this one didn't deliver for me.
keywords_2: Ice cream, Fudge cows, Toffee, Sugar cookie, Everything But The, Sugar, Ben and Jerry's

author: Ks 8
title: Would give 10 stars if i could.
text: Okay I’m not joking when I say I love and hate this flavor at the same time. I pe this flavor because it is BY FAR the best tasting Ben and Jerry’s flavor ever made, no competition... and i amd a huge Ben and Jerry’s fan. The reason I hate it is because this flavor has caused me to gain like 30 lbs at this point because I cannot stop eating it. It does not get old. Ever. The crunchy sweetness of the toffee is spot on amd just pairs PERFECTLY with the sugar cookie core and the milk chocolate ice cream. Oh yeah, MILK CHOCOLATE. The milk chocolate is so good. I have eaten probably like 50 of these at this point and everytime the core is big and i never get a bad core. Every pint i have gotten has been just as good ig not better than the last. Please Ben amd Jerry’s. If you are reading this. DO NOT MAKE THIS A LIMITED TIME FLAVOR.
keywords_2: Ben and Jerry's, toffee, sugar cookie core, milk chocolate, ice cream, crunchy sweetness, limited time flavor.

title: Perfect harmony
